action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two melee attacks with its longsword.

action.name: Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit (with disadvantage against a target within 5 ft.), reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) piercing damage, or 12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) piercing damage while mounted.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Skilled Rider
entries: Attack rolls made against the knightâ€™s mount have disadvantage.

trait.name: Thundering Charge
entries: If the knight is mounted and moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and hits it with a lance attack on the same turn, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
